item.title: Using PlayFab for cloud gaming
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: In this special interview, PlayFab CEO, James Gwertzman shares insight into how this robust cloud gaming services offers value with their Game Services, Game Manager, PlayStream, and an Add-On Marketplace.
item.content:encoded:
In this special interview, PlayFab CEO, James Gwertzman shares insight into how this robust cloud gaming service offers value with their Game Services, Game Manager, and PlayStream products in addition to an add-on Marketplace. Whether you want to have back-end building blocks for your live game, empower your team with a centralized mission control, see events in real-time, or expand your gameâ€™s features while reducing SDK fatigue, PlayFab has you covered.

Thank you for watching and listening!
